import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { FormGroup, ControlLabel, FormControl, Col, Grid, Row, Button, ButtonToolbar, ButtonGroup} from 'react-bootstrap'; export default class AddressDetailsForm extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.state ={ apt: '', streetAddress: '', city: '', state: '', time:'' } }; render() { return (

Where do you live, {this.props.values.firstName}?

*Street Address: Apt/Unit #: *City: *State: *Have you lived at this address for more than 2 years? options={[ { label: "Yes", value: "Yes"}, { label: "No", value: "No"} ]}
); } }
